Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3,732, FLOOR 28, CEP 04538-132,AVENIDA BRIGADEIRO FARIA LIMA, SAO PAULO, Brazil

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BRBI BR Partners S.A., through its subsidiaries, operates as an investment bank that specializes in providing financial services for entrepreneurs and families in Brazil. It offers financial advisory services for mergers and acquisitions, capital markets, board services, shareholders, special situations and restructuring, pre-IPO, and privatization, and wealth management services. The company originates and distributes asset- and mortgage-backed securities, real estate investment trusts, investment funds, credit and creditor notes, and debentures, and treasury sales and structuring for prospection, structuring, and execution of risk management operations in different interest, currency, and commodity markets, as well as engages in the provision of exchange closing and guarantee services. In addition, it offers derivatives, bank guarantee, current rating, financial statements, and foreign exchange services.
